name: GUIRIN BATTLE ALPHA
description:
GUIRIN BATTLE is a shoot n 'jump battle platform game, you must control these little creatures called Guirins who release powers through their mouths and can jump on platforms.

Whether for protection or honor you must use your skills to defeat your enemies and escape their attacks.
This game is an alpha version of GUIRIN BATTLE, 
which will be a game released in an 
IndieGogo's campaign. 
This version will still receive some updates 
so your feedback is very important.
Did you like the game? Loved it ? 
Then go to the social networks and the website
INDIEGOGO, July, 28th.
